title: How do you allow the caller to submit a variable number of arguments to a function?

choices.a: Using a prototype like function test(... $parameters).
choices.b: Using a prototype like function test() and the function func_get_args() inside the function body.
choices.c: Using a prototype like function test($parameters[]).
choices.d: Using a prototype like function test() and the function get_variable_args() inside the function body.
choices.e: This is not possible in PHP.
